title: Peking duck lettuce cups
ingredients: ['6 whole duck legs', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon coarse sea salt, or to taste', '2 teaspoons Chinese five-spice powder', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '3 spring onions, sliced into large pieces', '5 cloves garlic, halved', 'Serving sauce', '4 tablespoons hoisin sauce', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '1 teaspoon hot chilli sauce', '1 tablespoon duck fat', '18 whole little Gem lettuce leaves', 'Garnishes', '1 cucumber, diced', '6 spring onions, chopped, divided (or as needed)', '1 tablespoon sesame seeds']
